tests.report_a11y:
- Links must be distinguishable without relying on color (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block?application=axeAPI) (error)
  Url(s) with issues:
  - https://www.cjsharp.com/

issues.text: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block?application=axeAPI) (error)

subIssues.text: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block?application=axeAPI) (error)

extra.message: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block?application=axeAPI)
extra.selector: html > body > div > section > main > article:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1)
